module.caption: CRCCU - Cyclic Redundancy Check Calculation Unit
module.info: The CRCCU integrates a dedicated Cyclic Redundancy Check (CRC) engine. When configured and activated, this CRC engine performs a checksum computation on a Memory Area. CRC computation is performed from the LSB to MSB bit. Three different polynomials are available CCIT802.3, CASTAGNOLI and CCIT16.
